Text: Huh?  Can you please be more specific?

Get this info and much more  directly from the source...

http://cd3wd.com/data/index.htm

Torrent poster, please be aware that VERY few people will download this set sight unseen, especially given the extreme size of the set (25 gigabytes is a large chunk of many of our hard drives).  A listing of the contents by theme would help boost the downloads and your rating, not simply a file listing of the ISOs in question.
